comments.raw_text:
Looking at

  https://services.mozilla.com/sync/updated/?version=1.6&channel=dev

and other permutations thereof, the link "Recent Changes" points to

  https://services.mozilla.com/sync/updated/changelog.html

which shows as its most recent item

  Weave v1.2.1 (April 11, 2010)

    Sync a capped number of form history items to avoid slowing/hanging Firefox


This should either point to something else, or changelog.html should be updated and edited to say Sync, not Weave...

Furthermore, the URL

  https://services.mozilla.com/sync/updated/

shows Sync 1.2.3 as the latest version. That's probably not right.
